propertyDescriptor.name: EHRStudyContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the path to the container holding the EHR study. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/ehr'

propertyDescriptor.name: ProtocolPDFContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the path to the container holding PDFs of IACUC protocols. It is usually separate from the EHR study. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/ehr'
